body: @tobajas nice... I'd love a marathon before I sleep...

@The Ahegao God yeah there are two more parts called Hop vol.2 and Hop vol.3. To give an overview the story is that producer got drunk with 3 of his idols, Azuza, Miki and Chihaya. Producer and Azuza goes back to room has sex, producer falls asleep, Azuza drunk calls Chihaya who comes there and producer wakes up to have anal sex with her then falls asleep again. Miki see's Chihaya leave the producers room and sneakily enters to find the producer guy asleep but at full mast. So she has sex with the sleeping producer. Hop vol.1 starts with procucer waking up after these events and finding Azuza asleep in his room. Then it goes full circle with him sleeping with Azuza vol.1, Miki vol.2 then with both Azuza and Chihaya in vol.3.
